title: New York Times Media Group 's circulation revenue from Q1 2012 - Q4 2019
summary: This bar chart has 32 columns on the x axis representing Quarter, and Revenue in million U.S. dollars in each Quarter on the y axis.
Quarter Q4 2019 has the highest Revenue in million U.S. dollars and Q1 2012 has the lowest Revenue in million U.S. dollars.
The Revenue in million U.S. dollars of Quarter Q1 2012 is 1.45% smaller than the maximum value at Q4 2019.
min_summary: This bar chart has 32 columns on the x axis representing Quarter, and Revenue in million U.S. dollars in each Quarter on the y axis.
The maximum Revenue in million U.S. dollars 275.28 is found at Quarter Q4 2019 and the minimum is found at Q1 2012 where Quarter is 189.97.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 32 columns on the x axis representing Quarter, and Revenue in million U.S. dollars in each Quarter on the y axis.
Quarter Q4 2019 has the highest Revenue in million U.S. dollars and Q1 2012 has the lowest Revenue in million U.S. dollars.
The Revenue in million U.S. dollars of Quarter Q1 2012 is 1.45% smaller than the maximum value at Q4 2019.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Revenue in million U.S. dollars for 32 number of Quarters.
The Revenue in million U.S. dollars is highest at Quarter Q4 2019 and lowest at Quarter Q1 2012.
Second maximum Revenue in million U.S. dollars is found at Quarter Q1 2019.
The highest Quarter Q4 2019 has 85.31 more Revenue in million U.S. dollars than the lowest Quarter Q1 2012.
The Quarter Q4 2019 has the highest Revenue in million U.S. dollars, followed by Q1 2019, and Q2 2019. Down to the Quarter Q1 2012 which is the lowest.
Overall Revenue in million U.S. dollars has reduced over the Quarters.
The highest value 275.28 at Q4 2019 is almost 1.2 times larger than the average value 228.85.
Summing up the values of all Quarters, we get total 7323.34.
